msg:
Hello {user}!
Send a link to a track or playlist from Yandex Music. üéµ

I can download the track or show its details.
Use /help for more information.

Available commands:

/auth ‚Äî connect your Yandex Music account
‚Ä¢ Just send a Yandex Music link to get the track
‚Ä¢ /now ‚Äî send the currently playing track

Inline mode (@botname‚Ä¶):
‚Ä¢ `audio` ‚Äî send the current track as an audio file
‚Ä¢ `text` ‚Äî show track information
‚Ä¢ `music.yandex.ru/‚Ä¶` ‚Äî send a track by link
Please send your Yandex Music API key.
You can cancel this action at any time using /back.
For security reasons, authorization is available in private messages only.
An API key is already connected.
Would you like to replace it?
Verifying the API key, please wait‚Ä¶
The provided API key could not be verified.

messages.error-fetching: An error occurred while fetching the track.
messages.send-by-link: `https://music.yandex.ru...` ‚Äî get text or audio by link

msg: Sorry, the requested track could not be found.
